Hardware the AWS storage Gateway utilizes three key existing services in

Amazon's simple storage service or Amazon S3 Amazon S3 provides highly durable
blob storage for the Internet it's a great service for use cases like media distribution media
sharing but it's also an excellent service for use cases around backup and
archive because of the high level of durability scale ility and low cost that
Amazon S3 provides the next service is Amazon elastic compute cloud or Amazon
ec2 Amazon ec2 provides you with the ability to launch virtual instances in
the cloud we currently have 11 different types of instances varying in CPU and
RAM the last you the last service I'd like to cover is the Amazon elastic Block store or Amazon EBS
Amazon EBS provides you with the capability to create block storage volumes and attach these volumes to your
Amazon ec2 instances this allows your Amazon ec2 based applications to gain low latency
access to the data that they need Amazon EBS also allows you to take Point intime
snapshots of your EBS storage volumes and store these snapshots in S3 for
durable recovery you can then instantiate new EBS volumes from these

end the software Appliance exposes a compatible I scuzzy interface that works

the AWS storage Gateway also uploads your data to Amazon web
services where it is stored encrypted at rest in Amazon S3 in the form of Amazon

when you're running your applications in ec2 you don't have to worry about ensuring that your data that you've

storage Gateway the first key use case for the storage Gateway is around offsite

S3 you can utilize the storage Gateway for offside back up of your on premise
application data when you need to restore a backup all you need to do is specify the

key use case is around data mirroring enabling you to migrate your applications back and forth between your

through the use of the storage Gateway you're able to continuously upload your on- premise application data to AWS this

that you use the second key benefit is around simplifying your backups so today for

to uh to benefit from Rapid restoration of data both on premise and from your

you need to figure out which tapes you need to recover and then once you once you find the tape you need you need to

internet you don't have to wait until the restore completes before you start

snapshots just store the differentials so what that means is if I write a bunch
of data to a storage Gateway volume and I take a snapshot of this data then if I
go and I modify a couple of blocks of data and I take another snapshot that second snapshot only

for customers to take both ad hoc as well as scheduled snapshots so you can

Keys you can monitor any of the the key metrics like throughput between your
